unnormalised: Borem asa ixttankhonno, chala Differential Calculusachea ranvatti sonvsarant buddi maruya! Tumkam kednaim matematiks fokot amurt chinnamncho zomo dista kai? Thoddo Differential Calculus asl'lea vostunchem khorem sangtat. Vichar kara - tumchi bike kitlem vegaan vaddoita? Vo tumchem investment kitlench vegaan voir voita? Taka lagun hem zata!
normalised: Borem asa bhavanno, Differential Calculusachea zongli sonvsarant buddi maruya! Tumi kednaim गणित fokot amurt chinnam-i dista mhonntat? Tari Differential Calculus amkam vostavik sonvsar somzunk modot korunk xokta. Tacho vichar kara – tumchi bike kitli torepeden vaddta? Vo tumchea gunthovnukichem mul kitli giresten vaddta? Tea vellar hem kaam yeta!

unnormalised: Mukhvelponnan, hem kitem-i bodlotta tacho dar sodun kaddpak puro zata. Kallpna kara tum eka vankddya voir choltat. Differential calculus tumkam tea vankddyachi tirpos eka nirdisht thikanacher sodunk upkarta. Ami taka derivative mhantat. Eka khorea, khorea lagchim dolle-ni vankddya koddche nodrekhesar zata je meren tem eka sidhe rekhak dista. Monan uzo, chuke na?
normalised: Mulbhootponnan, tem kiteachoe bodlopachea dar sodhun kaddpachem asa. Kalpona kara tumi eke vankdde rekhacher choltat. Differential calculus tumkam eka khas binducher tea vankdde rekhecho dhol sodhunk modot korta. Ami taka derivative mhonntat. Tem vankdde rekhechim khub, khub lagimchim chitram kaddun te eke sidhe rekhe bhaxen dista. Monn dukhoupi, nhoe?

unnormalised: Atam, tumkam vichar yeunk xakta, "Thik asa, tor hanv hem koxem *korum*?" Thodde niyom ani formulache zome asat. Udahoronak, x^2 cha derivative 2x asa. Dukhi zanv naka tumkam hem nirarthok dista zalear. Ami thoim pavtele. Tumchea dukhi limitache problem tumim adim kele yad asat? Sodun kadd, tem hanga khub mhotvachem. Ami derivative ujvadak haddpak limit vapurtat. Hem sogllem jodllem asa!
normalised: Atam, tumkam prashn poddlo astolo, "Borem, hanv hem vostavikponnan koxem korun? " Borem, thodde niyam ani sutram asat. Udharonnak, x squaredachem derivative don x asa. Chinta korunk naka zaka gitpitavani bhaxen aikota. Ami thoim pavoitele. Tumkam adim kel'le te trasdaik limit problems tumkam yaad asat? Te sodankal hanga khub mhotvache asat mhonnpachem dislem. Ami derivative suchounak limit-acho vapor kortat. Tem sogllem zoddlelem asa!

unnormalised: Chala amchem upyogancher uloya. Kallpna kara tum ek pul rachitat. Tumkam khobor asunk zai to kitlem tan sohon korunk xakta. Differential calculus tumkam pulacher khub ani unnem tan kitlo asa, tem sodunk upkarta, taka lagun pul poddona. Vo eka factorichim utpadonachi rekha uttam korun vichar kara. Calculus vaprun, tumi kitlim vostu unne podarth vaprun koxi utpadon kortole mhonn tumkam sodunk mellta. Tem boreponnachem na?
normalised: Ami upyogancher ulo maruya. Kalpona kara tumi ek pul design kortat. Tumkam to kitlo tan sambhallunk xakta tem kollonk zai. Differential calculus tumkam pulacher choltat te maximum ani minimum tan ganṇe korun kollonk, taka nischit korun to poddona. Vo eka factorychea production line-ak uttam korunk vichar kara. Calculus-achem vapar korun, tumi unnea sadhnanchim vadd udyogik mal utponn korun kollonk xaktat. Tem thondd nhoe?

unnormalised: Ami tem physicsan vapurtat. Udahoronak, eka rocketacho veg ani proveg sodun kaddpak. Class 9 ani 10 velar Newtonache niyam yad asat? Ho, te mathsachea hea bhagant vikasit kel'lea vicharancher adharit asat. Ani arthik bhagant legit! Udahoronak, tum khoinche-i vostu vikpak uttam mol sodunk sodhtat zalear tumkam khub labh mellpak.
normalised: Ami taka physics-antui vaportat. Udharonnak, eka rocket-achem veg ani torepeden vadd sodhun kaddun. Tumkam class nau ani dhaantlem Newton's niyom yaad asat? Ho, te maths-achea hea vibhagant vikasit kel'lea vicharancher khub adharit asat. Ani orthashastrantiui! Udharonnak, tumi eka vostuk vikpaak uttam mol sodhunk prayatn kortat mhonn tumkam zata tem maximum লাভ mellounk.

unnormalised: Thik asa, tum pol rachekar vo rocket rachekar tor zaunchona. Punn differential calculus zannvai tumkam tumchea aspasachea sonvsaracher chintop korunk upkarta. Tum patte ani sambandh polleunk lagtat je tumim adim chukla astole. Fuddem tumchea resumecher tem khorea boreponnan dista!
normalised: Borem, tumi lagimchea kallant pulam vo rocket-anchi design korunk xakat nant. Punn differential calculus somzon gheun tumi tumchea aspasachea sonvsarachi odik kritikelponnan vichar korun modot korunk xaktat. Tumi adim chukun geleli rit ani bandhni tumi polleunk lagtat. Plus, tem tumchea resumeacher khub prabhavit dista!

unnormalised: Taka lagun, tuka stick kor, nirax zanv naka tumkam tem poileaveller kathinn dista zalear. Prayatn mhotvacho asa. Ani yad dovrat, budhivant ganitkar legit tumi atam asa thoim suru kelem. Ti RD Sharma pustokam bhair kadda bhavamno ani ghasunk suru kora! Tumkami tea integrationachem problem sodounk mellta je tumkam pattle satolle page number 346 voil'lem aslem!
normalised: Tech pasun, tancher thira ravat, nirash zanv naka tem poilech khepek kathin dista zalear. Sorav mukhio asa. Ani yaad dovorat, chotur गणितज्ञांची survaatui hangach zalea zaito tumi atam asa thaim. Tea R-D Sharma pustokanchea bhair bhailean yetat ani peesun suru korat! Tumkam tumi nimnnea satoddeak pan nnbor teenxim challis ani soshtacherli integration problem solve korunk zaita astali!
